channel.title: Webinar on Selenium
channel.description: Recent content in Webinar on Selenium

item.title: Selenium Community Live - Episode 1
item.description: At the eve of celebration of 20 years of Selenium, the current Project Leadership Committee of Selenium decided on starting Selenium Community Live event, an idea helmed by Maaret Pyhäjärvi . The first episode happened on Dec 18th, 2024: Selenium Community Live - Episode 1 Selenium Community Live - Episode 1 Collaboration, communication and community are the force behind the success of the Selenium Project in open source for last twenty years.

item.title: Celebrating 20 Years of Selenium: A Journey of Innovation in Browser Automation
item.description: This year marks a monumental milestone—20 remarkable years of Selenium, the tool that revolutionized browser automation! We’re thrilled to invite you to a special event to commemorate this incredible journey: Celebrating 20 Years of Selenium Two Decades of Selenium: Revolutionizing Open Source Browser Automation and Testing Over the past two decades, Selenium has reshaped the automation landscape, evolving from a simple tool into the backbone of browser automation across the globe.
